channel.title: John Lennon on CanzoniereOnline.it
channel.description: Recent content in John Lennon on CanzoniereOnline.it

item.title: Happy Christmas â€“ War Is over
item.description: And so this is Christmas and what have you done? Another year over, a new one just begun; And so this is Christmas, I hope you have fun the near and the dear ones, the old and the young. A merry, merry Christmas, and a happy New Year, Let’s hope it’s a good one, without any fear And so this is Christmas for weak and for strong The rich and the poor ones the road is so long.

item.title: Imagine
item.description: Imagine there’s \C7+no heaven, it’s easy if \C7+you try. No hell \C7+below us, above us \C7+only sky. Imagine all the people living for today! A-ah-a-a-a! Imagine there’s no countries, it isn’t hard to do. Nothing to kill or die for and no religion too. Imagine all the people living life in peace! Yu-huh-uh-uh-hu! You may say I’m a dreamer but I’m not the only one. I hope someday you’ll join us and the world will be as one.
